title: Gold for a shining finish: Johannes Lochner ends his career as a bobsleigh pilot as Olympic Champion in the 2-man and 4-man Bobsleigh - IBSF
summary_full: Gold for a shining finish: Johannes Lochner ends his career as a bobsleigh pilot as Olympic Champion in the 2-man and 4-man Bobsleigh  IBSFBobsleigh-Brilliant Lochner on course for double gold  Reuters‘Proud of what we’ve done’: Army sergeant, teammate come up just short — fourth — in Olympic bobsled  Stars and StripesMilan Cortina Olympics Bobsled  Idaho State JournalGermans go 1-2, Swiss claim first four-man medal in 20 years  KQ2
